query:
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `portfolio_allocations` (
  `id` varchar(64) NOT NULL,
  `userId` varchar(64) NOT NULL,
  `name` varchar(255) NOT NULL,
  `description` text,
  `targetAllocations` json NOT NULL,
  `rebalanceThreshold` decimal(5,2) NOT NULL DEFAULT 5.00,
  `rebalanceFrequency` enum('manual','daily','weekly','monthly','quarterly') NOT NULL DEFAULT 'manual',
  `lastRebalancedAt` timestamp NULL,
  `nextRebalanceAt` timestamp NULL,
  `preferredBrokers` json,
  `isActive` boolean NOT NULL DEFAULT true,
  `createdAt` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  `updatedAt` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  PRIMARY KEY (`id`)
)
command:
mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 2JvR2JmsVzzzo8g.542b2be615eb --database cYbBY4G8kX53fA5ZWwbsKK --execute CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `portfolio_allocations` (
  `id` varchar(64) NOT NULL,
  `userId` varchar(64) NOT NULL,
  `name` varchar(255) NOT NULL,
  `description` text,
  `targetAllocations` json NOT NULL,
  `rebalanceThreshold` decimal(5,2) NOT NULL DEFAULT 5.00,
  `rebalanceFrequency` enum('manual','daily','weekly','monthly','quarterly') NOT NULL DEFAULT 'manual',
  `lastRebalancedAt` timestamp NULL,
  `nextRebalanceAt` timestamp NULL,
  `preferredBrokers` json,
  `isActive` boolean NOT NULL DEFAULT true,
  `createdAt` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  `updatedAt` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  PRIMARY KEY (`id`)
)
